item.title: About
item.description: This is my personal site and blog. I am a web developer and linux enthusiast. var add2 = function(number) { return number + 2; } I’m new to this writing thing so the direction will be clear in the coming weeks & months but expect content regarding opensource-mainly linux tools, tech related news, soccer, and some brain dumps.
